price: 198. korosey sin Yallitte tirtô fanah secteenik sin seeco mataabba, Nabiyow is koo wagta numih innah koo fan afkunah tet table is koo matablaay.
arabic: وَإِن تَدۡعُوهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰ لَا يَسۡمَعُواْۖ وَتَرَىٰهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيۡكَ وَهُمۡ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-in tadʿūhum ilā al-hudā lā yasmaʿū watarāhum yanẓurūna ilayka wahum lā yub'ṣirūna
